message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be highly valuable to you. I'm thinking of a price around $9,500. What do you think?
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion, but I am hoping to keep my spending within a lower budget. Would you consider lowering the price to $8,500?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $9,500 is already a very competitive price for this product and its value. Could you meet me halfway at $9,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value and condition of the product, I would like to propose a price of $8,800.
